attributes.action: Give tax payers the right to opt out of certain government schemes.
attributes.additional_details: As a tax payer and contributor to society, for far too long, the government has made free our contributions.
attributes.background: Obtain consent from tax payers how their contributions are used

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about tax payers not having the right to opt out of certain Government schemes, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
